summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3360 for the improvement of Nickerson Street and West Nickerson Street, from 3rd Avenue North to a connection with the existing trestle roadway at 15th Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41521, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
